Description.Text: The Holiday Inn Express Kennedy Airport completed renovations in Jan 2008 and is situated approximately 12 miles from New York City, eight miles from LaGuardia Airport, and less than a half-mile from John F. Kennedy International Airport, with a complimentary shuttle available.

• MANHATTAN/NYC • YANKERR STADIUM • Long Island • Brooklyn • Local Restaurants • JAMAICA STATION SUPTHIN BLVD E TRAIN • JAMAICA STATION SUPTHIN BLVD E TRAIN • FLUSHING QUEENS NY • Jacob Javits Convention Center • NYC/Manhattan • GREEN ACRES MALL • Aqueduct Raceway • BELMONT PARK • Citi Field Shea Stadium

Holiday Inn Express JFK Airport hotel offers 129 guest rooms. Guestrooms feature complimentary wireless Internet access and flat-panel TVs with premium channels. Beds have signature Holiday Inn bedding. Phones come with voice mail. All rooms have coffee/tea makers. A complimentary newspaper is delivered to guestrooms weekday mornings.

Starting From:John F. Kennedy Shuttles depart from the hotel to JFK at the top of every hour. Shuttles depart from JFK Airport to the hotel every 15 minutes from Station C - Federal Circle stop on the Air Train. Starting From:JAMAICA STATION SUPTHIN BLVD E TRAIN Free shuttle to the Air Train Station at Kennedy Airport from the hotel every hour on the hour. Then take the Air Train ($5) to the subway ($2) to Manhattan and other areas. Starting From:JAMAICA STATION SUPTHIN BLVD E TRAIN Cost of subway $2 into Manhattan. Long Island Railroad only 3 miles/$9 into Manhattan. Rates vary to Long Island. Starting From:Laguardia Van Wyck Expwy to S. Belt Parkway exit 20. Stay on service road, hotel on right 1/2 mile.
Local resturant and in room delivery menu
